profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining production-grade user-facing software systems, specifically mentioning integrations with customer APIs and contact centers, and working on a UI for document training and encouragement. It also highlights the company's passion for neural networks, LLMs, and AI ethics, and their goal of creating user-friendly AI assistants. While it mentions full-stack development, the core focus aligns with the GenAI Engineer role's responsibility of developing and deploying applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren' directly refers to the design, development, and maintenance of software services, which is a core aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren

job_tasks.justification: Building integrations with various customer APIs and contact centers involves developing software to connect different systems, a key software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van integraties met verschillende API's van onze klanten

job_tasks.justification: Working on the UI to make document training and encouragement accessible to customers involves front-end development and user interface design, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan de UI om documenttraining en aanmoediging toegankelijk te maken voor onze klanten

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven' describes continuous improvement of code quality and architectural design for maintainability and scalability, which are fundamental software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven

job_tasks.justification: The company's passion for 'neurale netwerken, LLM en AI-ethiek' and their goal of creating 'digitale collega's, aangedreven door AI' strongly implies work with generative models and AI, which falls under the modeling category.
The mention of 'digitale collega's, aangedreven door AI' suggests the development or application of AI models to create intelligent agents or assistants.
The phrase 'ontwerpen van complexe softwareproducten' indicates experience in the broader software engineering lifecycle, including design and architecture.
The requirement to 'neemt beveiliging en privacy serieus' in the context of developing AI-driven products points to secure software development practices.

soft_skills.phrase: voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven
deel uit te maken van onze beginfase, wat enorm uniek is en veel energie geeft!
